executiveSummary: Entrepreneur Tomo pitched Noshi, an organic edible 'food paint' designed to make mealtime fun for kids, asking the Sharks for $250,000 in exchange for 17% equity. Despite initial skepticism about pricing, margins, and limited sales growth, Mark Cuban offered $250,000 for 25%, and Tomo accepted the deal.
keyDecisions: Mark Cuban invested $250,000 for 25% equity in Noshi.

actionItems.task: Expand Walmart distribution from 370 to 1500 stores for Noshi products.
Develop smaller, lower-priced single-serve product options to increase consumer trial and sales.
Increase online presence and e-commerce sales strategy for Noshi.

nextSteps: Tomo will collaborate with Mark Cuban to scale production, optimize packaging and pricing, and expand both retail and online sales channels for Noshi.
